Package clutter.abstractwidgets

Class MultiChildWidget

java.lang.Object
clutter.abstractwidgets.Widget
clutter.abstractwidgets.MultiChildWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickEventHandler, Debuggable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Column, Row
public abstract class MultiChildWidget extends Widget
A widget that can have multiple child widgets.
